comments.body: This is a good pun :)
Nice, I need more excuses to get more of the furry friends. I'm in!
I like the idea many it can have its own biome of some sort
Maybe it could drop some sort of umbral leather item that could be used to make invisible item frames?

@Ashdasher7625, This is a mob from Minecraft Earth.
She is a cow, but she can be scissors and produces black wool.

this is good like not a boat but like tame and sadle a dolphin or craft a surf board also waves to surf on

it would be cool  but unlike boat it will die on land :[ :]

so add it
I whold love that.
that is good and all but no dimension it should be tamable and rideable and should fly
This is stupid: the zombie villager is underwater and nothing happens, he doesn't even die.
I agree, it would be Awesome to turn both zombie villagers and villagers into drowned villagers and maybe even be able to cure them!!!!!!
Gh
The only thing I would say is that they should be found in a secret room in the Woodland Mansion. The secret room will NEVER be announced on where it is or how to get there but it will be announced.
There are already commands to secretly send messages. This would be more useful if they could carry items
they could have like a 4 item inventory
4 Item slot is pretty good.  I like this for an Achievment-friendly world!  Plus, it could be fun to send messages to each other!
I agree.  Private Messaging would be fun.  Plus the time it would take for a crow to fly large distances would keep you on a world for a while!  Players would get less bored!
Good idea, it's a very minor addition so I think it'd work
I'm not sure if this is a thing, but when Endermen spawn they should have the teleport particles around them, making it seem as if they have just teleported from another dimension with the block
Also, Endermen shouldn't spawn carrying blocks from the dimension they are currently in, they should be holding blocks from other dimensions as if they just teleported from there

Also, what if naming an endermen makes it so they can still despawn, but their data is saved so they can respawn with the same name and block, even in other dimensions. If they could then be tricked into picking up certain blocks they could be used to transport stuff

Would be great for the finite blocks in Skyblock. I think its important that these particular enderman not be able to place their blocks. To avoid breaking farms and just causing random blocks in the world.
It's a simple solution that solves quite a lot of problems!

I think they should be able to spawn in any dimension with any holdable block and be able to place them as well. This would allow Enderman farms in the End to also function as farms for those blocks, which would not only be helpful in Skyblock maps, as another user pointed out, but also allow for renewable sand and red sand without relying on Wandering Traders, as well as renewable Netherrack when they drop nylium.

And considering the fact that they could spawn with blocks in the April Fools' 22w13oneBlockAtATime update, this could be a possible feature.
Be clear with why you are suggesting these mobs. Will they have a new mechanic? Are they there to make the game have more life?
I wanted to see these added to just the plains biomes.
I think they should be added to the badlands! The badlands lacks a lot of life and prairie dogs are found there so it makes sense!
Please for the love of god make this a real thing I would love for this animal to be in game PLEASE üò≠ I WOULD DIE FOR THIS.

yes this is exactly what we need

please vote for this
i think its a great idea as it would add a little bit more of a terrifying sci-fi PAZAZ
i think it shoud be a new civilization
Different
How would it interact with piglins if either went through either‚Äôs dimension?
They should have hordes of gold
i agre :)
Phantoms should only attack players that didnt sleep
i love this idea
Please, PLEASE vote for this, I love dragons, and the idea of making flying easier for people in PE.
Great idea let‚Äôs tell the creators!
Great idea. Why is this not already a thing? Vote for this.

They could just break one block of bamboo above the lowest one, so the bamboo can regrow.

Also, if the bamboo is sheared, it will regrow only up to that point (or maybe shearing would prevent pandas from breaking it).

The area they cover and the toughness of the fight should be scaled, large area : hard boss, but small area : weaker boss. Just so it isn't a huge hassle to clear an area on like a server. Like if you make it so its, every 100 blocks, make the boss really weak, or make it just a spawner. And if its every 10000 blocks, make it super hard.

Like I said, it should be an adventure in the early game, but not a chore in the late game.

Title: ‚ÄúIdea to add the zombie horse in survival‚Äù

Text: ‚ÄúOne idea I came up with is that in the depths they would get like abandoned "houses" as seen in minecraft live and that there was a small percentage of that inside them there is a zombie horse tied up (since it is inside the game but can not be found in survival) as if it had been abandoned for a long time and locked down there , and that the player has a hard time bringing it to the surface so that he can manage them as much as he can through the new caves and rescue him‚Äù

- Translated by Admin
Neat idea!

I think they should spawn in a small patrol at night. The Zombies should attack by dashing towards the player and hitting them with an iron pickaxe since they would have them because they are the remains of gold miners.

this would be awsome and a huge step for the minecraft comunity
Cow + Mooshroom should have a chance to have calfs of Cows and Mooshrooms red and browns variants... thats would be awsome!
Out of the three this on has the most information about the mob and is an endangered species so it could also bring irl awareness too love it and it's my favorite stork

I know MOJANG mentioned the ostrich for the savannah biome. I am hopeful to have a nice bird in Minecraft in the next few years. The parrots are not only exceptionally rare, but may be perceived by some players as frustrating or annoying due to their mimicry behavior.

 

I prefer they not add ostriches because ostriches run at a fast speed, enabling them to be avoidant of players. I want to be able to approach the bird. I perceive the shoebill as a soft personality bird and feel it'd be a good friend for me in the game. I want to be able to drop a fish for the shoebill and have the shoebill walk over to the fish and consume it.
I also think of this when I found shoebill on fb reels
yes nerf their aim and speed! I mean they're skeletons ;-;, also the skeletons should have a reload animation and maybe a quiver on their back just for the texture
